description: This file defines the main layout component for a React application, including navigation, sidebar, header, and main content areas. It manages UI state and routing for the app.

methods.name: GlobalDateSelector
methods.description: A React component that provides a date range picker for filtering data, dispatching the selected range to the Redux store.

methods.name: RootLayout
methods.description: Main layout component that structures the application's header, sidebar, and content area, and manages navigation and UI state.
